column2: THIS IS ALPHA. I HAVE LOCATED THE SNIPER. ENGAGING. OVER.
ALPHA BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. ENEMY SNIPER TEAM IS ELIMINATED. OVER.
BRAVO TO ALPHA. GET READY FOR PICK UP. OVER.
LZ IN SIGHT. GET READY PEOPLE. OVER.
GOOD LUCK. GO GET SOME SNIPERS. BRAVO OUT.
THIS IS CHARLIE. I HAVE LOCATED THE SNIPERS. ENGAGING. OVER.
THIS IS DELTA. WE HAVE FOUND THE SNIPER TEAM. ENGAGING! OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA BLACK. COPY. RETURN TO BASE. OVER.
